claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).

extracted_evidence.quote: The purified and trimeric recombinant HA proteins were expressed from the baculovirus system using the established procedures 45.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote directly states that recombinant HA proteins (the antigen in Flublok) are produced using a baculovirus system, which is the core of the BEVS platform.

extracted_evidence.quote: a recombinant influenza vaccine (Flublok Quadrivalent by SanofiPasteur, RIV4).
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote identifies Flublok as a recombinant influenza vaccine, which is necessary context for understanding that the recombinant HA described above is the antigen in Flublok.
